Detailed Description

This class is used to store a list of FileContentElement. This list is updated when new element is added to the list, or when element are removed. This list can be used to represent the File contente tree in a list structure for the completion.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Create a list of FileContentElement with the root element root.

Destroy the list but not the tree
